DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate efficacy safety two different dose regimen 0.5 mg ranibizumab give intravitreal injection comparison verteporfin PDT patient visual impairment due choroidal neovascularization ( CNV ) secondary pathologic myopia ( PM ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Ranibizumab Patients With Visual Impairment Due Choroidal Neovascularization Secondary Pathologic Myopia
DOC.criteria: Visual impairment due choroidal neovascularization ( CNV ) secondary PM Best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) study eye > 24 < 78 Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study ( ETDRS ) letter High myopia ( > 6D ) , anteriorposterior elongation > 26 mm ; posterior change compatible pathologic myopia Either lesion type study eye : subfoveal , juxtafoveal , extrafoveal Patients uncontrolled systemic ocular disease Blood pressure > 150/90 mmHg History panretinal , focal/grid laser photocoagulation intraocular treatment antiVEGF vPDT study eye Intravitreal treatment corticosteroid intraocular surgery within last 3 month study eye Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
